snippet: Gov. Susana Martinez’s former campaign manager pleaded guilty on Monday to two counts in a case that accused him of intercepting her email.
abstract: Jamie Estrada, former campaign manager for New Mexico Gov Susana Martinez, pleads guilty to intercepting Martinez's email and making false statements to federal investigators; faces up to one year in jail.
lead_paragraph: Gov. Susana Martinez’s former campaign manager pleaded guilty on Monday to two counts in a case that accused him of intercepting her email.

headline.main: New Mexico: Ex-Campaign Aide Admits He Leaked Governor’s Email
headline.print_headline: New Mexico: Ex-campaign Aide Admits He Leaked Governor’s Email
